.strata--linklist .links__list:nth-of-type(1){-ms-flex-order:1;order:1;-ms-flex:0 1 auto;flex:0 1 auto;-ms-flex-item-align:stretch;align-self:stretch}
.strata--linklist .links__list:nth-of-type(2){-ms-flex-order:2;order:2;-ms-flex:0 1 auto;flex:0 1 auto;-ms-flex-item-align:stretch;align-self:stretch}
.strata--linklist .links__list:nth-of-type(3){-ms-flex-order:4;order:4;-ms-flex:0 1 auto;flex:0 1 auto;-ms-flex-item-align:stretch;align-self:stretch}
.strata--linklist .links__list:nth-of-type(4){-ms-flex-order:3;order:3;-ms-flex:0 1 auto;flex:0 1 auto;-ms-flex-item-align:stretch;align-self:stretch}
}
@media screen and (min-width:701px){.strata--linklist .links__wrapper{display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-ms-flex-direction:row;flex-direction:row;-ms-flex-wrap:nowrap;flex-wrap:nowrap;-ms-flex-pack:start;justify-content:flex-start;-ms-flex-line-pack:start;align-content:flex-start;-ms-flex-align:start;align-items:flex-start}
.strata--linklist .links__list:nth-of-type(1){-ms-flex-order:1;order:1;-ms-flex:0 1 23%;flex:0 1 23%;-ms-flex-item-align:auto;align-self:auto;margin-right:2.66%}
.strata--linklist .links__list:nth-of-type(2){-ms-flex-order:3;order:3;-ms-flex:0 1 23%;flex:0 1 23%;-ms-flex-item-align:auto;align-self:auto;margin-right:2.66%}
.strata--linklist .links__list:nth-of-type(3){-ms-flex-order:4;order:4;-ms-flex:0 1 23%;flex:0 1 23%;-ms-flex-item-align:auto;align-self:auto}
.strata--linklist .links__list:nth-of-type(4){-ms-flex-order:2;order:2;-ms-flex:0 1 23%;flex:0 1 23%;-ms-flex-item-align:auto;align-self:auto;margin-right:2.66%}
}
.strata--4up--secondary .teasers{width:100%;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-ms-flex-wrap:wrap;flex-wrap:wrap;-ms-flex-pack:justify;justify-content:space-between}
.strata--4up--secondary .teasers:before{content:none}
.strata--4up--secondary .teasers .teaser{width:calc(25% - 12px);margin-bottom:30px;float:none;display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;margin-right:0}
.strata--4up--secondary .teasers .teaser:nth-of-type(3n+1){clear:none;margin-right:0}
.strata--4up--secondary .teasers .teaser:nth-of-type(4n){margin-right:0}
@media screen and (min-width:401px) and (max-width:700px){.strata--4up--secondary .teasers .teaser{width:calc(50% - 8px);margin-right:0}
.strata--4up--secondary .teasers .teaser:nth-of-type(2n),.strata--4up--secondary .teasers .teaser:nth-of-type(3n){margin-right:0}
}
.strata--4up--secondary .teasers .teaser a{color:#333}
.strata--4up--secondary .teasers .teaser a:hover{color:#177c9c}
.strata--4up--secondary:first-of-type .teaser{margin-bottom:0}
.strata--4up{display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-ms-flex-direction:row;flex-direction:row;-ms-flex-wrap:wrap;flex-wrap:wrap}
.strata--4up a{color:#333}
.strata--4up a:hover{color:#177c9c;text-decoration:underline}
.strata--4up .teaser{width:100%}
@media screen and (min-width:401px){.strata--4up{margin-bottom:30px}
.strata--4up .teaser{background-image:none;border-top:none}
}
@media screen and (max-width:400px){.strata--4up--secondary .teasers .teaser{width:100%}
.strata--4up .teaser .teaser__title{text-align:center}
.strata--4up .teaser{margin-bottom:30px}
}
.strata--4up .teaser:first-child{border-top:none}
.strata--4up .teaser:last-child{margin-bottom:0}
@media screen and (min-width:701px){.strata--4up .teaser .teaser__title{text-align:left}
.strata--4up .teaser{width:23.75%;margin-right:1.66%;border-bottom:none}
.strata--4up .teaser:nth-of-type(3n+1){clear:none}
.strata--4up .teaser:nth-of-type(4n+1){clear:left}
}
.strata--4up .teaser h3{padding-top:30px;text-align:center;font-size:17px;font-size:1.0625rem;font-weight:400;text-transform:uppercase;margin-bottom:20px;color:#231F20}
.strata--4up .teaser:last-of-type{margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0}
@media screen and (min-width:401px) and (max-width:700px){.strata--4up .teaser{width:45%;margin-right:10%;margin-bottom:20px}
.strata--4up .teaser:nth-of-type(1n+3){border-top:1px solid #ccc}
.strata--4up .teaser:nth-of-type(2n+2){margin-right:0}
.strata--4up .teaser:nth-of-type(3n){margin-right:10%}
.strata--4up .teaser:nth-of-type(3n+1){clear:none}
}
@media screen and (min-width:400px){.strata--4up .teaser__links{padding-left:0;padding-right:0}
}
.strata--4up .teaser__links a{display:block;border-top:1px solid #ccc;padding:15px 10px 15px 15px}
@media screen and (min-width:400px){.strata--4up .teaser__links a{padding-left:0;border-top:0;padding-top:8px;padding-bottom:8px}
}
@media screen and (min-width:701px){.strata--4up .teaser h3{font-size:15px;font-size:.9375rem}
.strata--4up .teaser__links a{border:0;padding:0 0 10px}
}
@media screen and (min-width:400px){.strata--4up .teaser__links p:first-child a{border-top:none}
}
[class*=" icon-"],[class^=icon-]{display:inline-block}
[class*=" icon-"]:before,[class^=icon-]:before{margin-right:.2em;line-height:1;font-family:ldsicon}
.icon{overflow:hidden;letter-spacing:-99px;box-sizing:content-box;line-height:1;font-family:ldsicon;height:1.2em;width:1.2em;vertical-align:bottom}
.icon:before{margin-right:0;display:block;letter-spacing:0;margin-bottom:1em}
@-moz-document url-prefix(){[class*=" icon-"]:before,[class^=icon-]:before{vertical-align:-10%}
.icon{vertical-align:middle}
}
a.icon:hover{text-decoration:none;background:0 0}
.icon-close:before{content:"\2613"}
.icon-facebook:before{content:"\e007"}
.ie .icon-facebook:before{margin-top:2px}
.icon-twitter:before{content:"\e001"}
.icon-googleplus:before{content:"\e008"}
.icon-pinterest:before{content:"\e005"}
.mozilla .icon-pinterest:before{margin-top:1px;margin-left:1px;vertical-align:-33%}
.ie .icon-pinterest:before{margin-top:1px;margin-left:1px}
.mozilla .icon-pinterest{vertical-align:-33%}
.rounded{margin:0 auto 15px;display:block;border:8px solid rgba(255,255,255,.8);border-radius:500px;position:relative;box-shadow:0 0 3px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.04),0 -2px 1px rgba(255,255,255,.9)}
.rounded img,.rounded:after{border-radius:500px;width:100%}
@media screen and (min-width:701px){.rounded{border-width:5px}
}
.rounded:after{display:block;content:"";clear:both;height:100%;position:absolute;top:0}
.rounded img{position:relative;vertical-align:middle}
